author: eptwts
text:
can instantly tell if someone has what it takes to blow up on social media by taking one small peak at their bio...

it clearly shows if you have taste & an eye for aesthetic - sounds like a stupid small thing that doesn't matter, but it's real

if i see a clusterfuck of accolades in your bio separated by those dumb ass vertical dividers ik your ass belongs on linkedin

pretty funny how many accounts with a real face attached seem more AI-generated than this turqoise circle
